## InferSchema type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type InferSchema<T> = Omit<T, keyof BasicMetaData> extends {
    const: infer U;
} ? T & BasicMetaData<U> : T extends {
    enum: infer U;
} ? T & BasicMetaData<ArrayElement<U>> : T extends {
    type: infer U;
} ? Omit<T, Exclude<keyof TypeSchema, "type">> & Match<U, InferSchemaMap<T>> & Omit<BasicMetaData<InferSchemaType<T>>, "default"> & {
    default?: InferSchemaType<T> | Fn.Callable<{
        return: InferSchemaType<T>;
    }>;
} : T extends Schema<infer U> ? T : SchemaInput;
```
